aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.text: My name is Mélanie Rodrigues, and I'm a creative developer based in Lisbon, Portugal. With my 3 years of experience as a product designer and project manager, I bring a unique perspective to my current work as a developer. I'm passionate about all things tech and design, and I love nothing more than creating beautiful and functional websites and applications. In my free time, I enjoy exploring the world of game development, riding my motorcycle, camping, and indulging in my love of illustration. My approach to work is all about collaboration, creativity, and clean code! I believe that a positive and solution-driven attitude is essential to success. If you're interested in working together on a project, please don't hesitate to get in touch. I'm always up for a new challenge and would love to hear about your ideas.

littleApresentation.title: Mélanie
littleApresentation.subtitle: creative developer
littleApresentation.paragraph: I’m a software engineer specializing in building exceptional digital experiences. Currently, I’m focused on building accessible, human-centered products at Innovation Makers

project1.name: BAIDirecto - Internet Banking:
project1.description: I was tasked with optimizing the existing app for improved scalability and performance. My contributions included utilizing my expertise in front-end development, including Vue.js, to improve the platform's responsiveness, speed, and overall user experience. Through careful analysis and optimization of the codebase, I was able to enhance the platform's functionality, such as account balances, transactions, and payment services, while ensuring the platform was accessible to all users.
